sermons.title: The Seal is Broken
sermons.speaker: Dr. Bishop Gideon Titi-Ofei
sermons.summary: The season of containment is over. The seal of limitation has been shattered by the Lion of the Tribe of Judah, and what was hidden is now being revealed for your glory!.

sermons.title: The God of multiplication
sermons.speaker: Lady Rev. Olivia Titi-Ofei
sermons.summary: God doesn't just add to your life; He multiplies! He is taking your five loaves and two fish and turning your 'not enough' into 'more than enough' for the multitude..

sermons.title: Time of worship with The Lord's Anointed
sermons.speaker: Pastor Kevin Titi-Ofei
sermons.summary: Worship is the bridge between your trial and your triumph. When you give Him your breath in praise, He gives you His strength for the journey.

sermons.title: Unusual Prayer Chambers, Unusual Prayers Unusual Answers
sermons.speaker: Dr. Bishop Gideon Titi-Ofei
sermons.summary: Standard prayers won't solve unusual problems. It takes a deep groaning in the secret chamber to unlock the answers that bypass the protocols of men.

sermons.title: The 12 Laws of Influence
sermons.speaker: Dr. Bishop Gideon Titi-Ofei
sermons.summary: Building a mind that can withstand the pressures of high-level ministry and corporate leadership. Shifting from victim to victor.

sermons.title: Falling in Love
sermons.speaker: Lady Rev. Olivia-Titi Ofei
sermons.summary: A refreshing look at 1 Corinthians 13 and how authentic love serves as the foundation for all successful ministry work.

sermons.title: The D.I.S.C.I.P.L.E.
sermons.speaker: Pastor Kevin Titi-Ofei
sermons.summary: Identifying the invisible barriers that stop progress and using the authority of Christ to dismantle ancestral strongholds.

sermons.title: The Perfect Will Of God
sermons.speaker: Pastor Joshua Heward-Mills
sermons.summary: Understanding the angelic hierarchy and how to deploy heavenly messengers to assist in your earthly assignment.
